channel.title: La Cantate De Tango on Simba Tango

item.title: Upcoming Tango Movies: "Tanguero" and "La cantante de tango"
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: A short update on a couple of upcoming tango movies. I find it somewhat promising that none of them seem to be about a middle aged dancer or hit man coming to Buenos Aires and there discovering tango and through it, themselves. Still, they may include other clich√©s such as lost love and finding oneself through tango: Tanguero Omar, a Tango instructor, is forced to return to Buenos Aires because of an important phone call.
